slides.quote: I regularly lead worship, but I've never liked the sound of my own voice. After a few months with Remi, I began to understand concepts, and then the muscle memory started to take over. I started to really hear it in my own voice - that openness I was looking for. I now like to listen to myself sing, which helps me trust that other people do, too!
slides.name: - worship leader in Seattle, USA (online)

slides.quote: I started taking online lessons because I wanted to sing more freely as a worship leader and to reach higher notes with ease. Through the lessons, I learned not only how to control the transition into my high range but also how my body actually works. Now I feel much more comfortable expressing myself while singing and truly enjoy using my voice in worship.
slides.name: - worship leader in Tokyo, Japan (online)
